thread.title: Bipasha Basu to be in Dubai this week
thread.title_full: Bipasha Basu to be in Dubai this week

title: Bipasha Basu to be in Dubai this week
text: Bipasha Basu to be in Dubai this week Web Team   | Last updated on February 28, 2017 at 11.19 am Share Vote She will inaugurate the new Al Adil outlet in Meena Bazaar Bipasha Basu will be in Dubai this Friday to inaugurate the 35th outlet at Dubai's Al Adil Group in Meena Bazaar, Bur Dubai. The grand opening of this outlet will take place at 7 pm in the market area. Dr Dhananjay (Jay) Datar, Chairman and Managing Director, Al Adil Trading said "It is a proud moment for all of us to establish our 35th outlet in Dubai. The showroom is strategically located next to Raymond Showroom, Meena Bazaar, Bur Dubai. This business destination is popular among all citizens and tourists as well. The new outlet will meet the increasing demand of people for high quality Indian food stuff in and around Bur Dubai. Our expansion plan is a growing a testimony to the faith that our customers have in our products. Today Al Adil has become synonymous with high quality Indian foodstuff. As a special gesture we will have inaugural offers for a wide range of Indian foodstuff in the Meena Bazaar outlet." Talking about Bipasha Basu being part of the opening, he said, "Bipasha Basu has established herself as an actress with her exemplary performances. She is known for her self-confidence and roles that stand out. In the highly competitive Indian film industry she has carved a name for herself, just like how Al Adil has carved a name for quality Indian food stuff in this part of the world. We are happy that Bipasha Basu has agreed to come all the way from India exclusively for our inauguration. Her charming presence will add value to our new Meena Bazaar showroom inauguration." In the almost 30 years since opening its first store in the UAE, Al Adil has acquired a cult-like status among Indian expatriates. Al Adil Supermarket also has the major brand Peacock. Under the Peacock brand umbrella the group serves all types of spices, pulses and Indian foodstuff items that are packed and sold in various packing sizes according to the customer requirement. The super stores offer more than 8500 items imported directly from India.
